summary: With this mod you can have as many Dragon Followers as you want!
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE WATCH THE VIDEO!

I made this mod after the Skeleton Dragon Companion Mod, it works pretty much in the same way, simply fast travel and you get your very own Dragon Horde!

Install:

Simply Download The Dragon Horde File Folder And Copy And Paste Their Esp File To The Skyrim Data File Folder Under Your C: Drive In Your Steam Folder And You Are Good To Go!

Computer Install = C:/Steam/Steam Apps/Skyrim/Common/Data

Notes:
There are 5 separate Dragons to choose from, you can have one of each or all five it is up to you! They all have voices corresponding to where they come from as well. Also I made them separate files so you can mod them and make your own horde, so your welcome! Also they will speak in battle, very cool.

Special Notes:
You need multiples of the ESP files to have multiple Dragons, this mod works on copy and paste, also I did it this way because Skyrim has a limit on how many companions you can have in game, so the copy and paste is a work around. So in short 5 ESP Files = 5 Dragons, like you see in the photo above!

Dragons:
Crimsonhellkite The Bane: is based of the Boss Dragon Design
Helm of the Black Mist: Demon Style Dragon
Moldean of the Forest: Forest Style Dragon
Dread Bitten of the Frost: Frost or Snow Style Dragon
Rayne of the Wind: Female Wind Style Dragon

Issues: None, I have 10 of these dragons right now in my game with a dozen extra mods installed, so if it works for me it must work for you!

Thanks and have fun with it!
author: DrakenKnight of DrakenKnightGames
